main event: A civilian rancher observed a football-shaped object with flashing green lights on either end in Ferron, Utah on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was viewed through 7 x 50 binoculars,The object appeared unusually large and high,It moved at a high rate of speed,The object was described with details of flashing green lights on either end and a flashing red light in the center,The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes.
